text: Jim Papai (born c. 1949) was a Canadian football player who played for the Hamilton Tiger-Cats and Edmonton Eskimos. He won the Grey Cup with Hamilton in 1972. He played college football on a football scholarship at the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill.http://www.justsportsstats.com/footballstatsindex.php?player_id=papaijim001http://www.brantfordexpositor.ca/2012/10/21/one- season-but-what-a-season ==References== Category:1940s births Category:Living people Category:Edmonton Eskimos players Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Brantford Category:North Carolina Tar Heels football players Category:Grey Cup champions Category:Canadian players of American football
title: Jim Papai
